data.text: @lexapr0_ Thalidomide you mean? It’s readily available worldwide, for multiple myeloma and other cancers, using strict protocols for women of child bearing age.
@lexapr0_ Nothing is 100% sure thing in life! As a thalidomide survivor, I, of all ppl, know this. 🇨🇦🤔
@lexapr0_ Thalidomide was 60 yrs ago. Science has improved greatly since then. Also it wasn’t anything like a vax. It was a sedative that drs prescribed off label with bad results. Still, not a vax.
